data.eml:eml: Four new species of Pomphopsilla Jałoszyński and a new record of Cephennodes glabella Castellini in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Scydmaeninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł (2016): Four new species of Pomphopsilla Jałoszyński and a new record of Cephennodes glabella Castellini in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 4098 (3): 593-600, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4098.3.11
